root.name: Zombie Bowl-O-Rama
root.description: Zombie Bowl-O-Rama is a zombie themed bowling game with a range of different powers that can either aid yourself in winning or sabotaging the enemy. The game features a singleplayer campaign against an AI, a freeplay challenge mode and 2-player local multiplayer. PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows Vista/XP/2000Processor: Pentium III 1GHz ProcessorMemory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: DirectX Compatible 16 or 32-bit Video Card with 64MB VRAMDirectXÂ®: 9.0 or higherHard Drive: 140 MB Free HD SpaceSound: DirectSound-compatible sound card
